description: I build high quality web application software using my 10 years of experience, knowledge and skills of frontend and backend technologies and DevOps.
I am a fast learner and always keen to bring in latest trends and best practices in the industry to the projects where appropriate, to deliver best value.
Build and maintain National Incident and Event Management System (NIEMS) of New Zealand’s traffic operation centers.
Designed and implemented Azure DevOps CI/CD pipelines for NIEMS
Design, document and build backend services (Java/NodeJS) and frontend components using ReactJS.
Maintain/Configure the Kubernetes cluster and Google Cloud based services managed with Terraform (Infrastructure as Code).
Working with a great agile team and providing leadership to the team where needed.
Involved in customizing a Business Insurance web portal for New Zealand market needs.

Initiated the project as the 1st developer joined and customized/built Java Spring services. Developed frontend components using AngularJS and did system integration with backend Insurance quote processing systems
Sky TV is a New Zealand's satellite television and streaming company. I worked on a Sky TV’s media processing project called DNA

I developed a Java/Cucumber based test framework for Sky TV's backend media transcoding system integration. And also contributed with fixing bugs of transcoding system integration with other internal systems
WEX New Zealand is an international provider for fuel card solutions.

I worked on system integration for a fuel card PIN authorization module via Web Services (SOAP). Contributed to build and enhance features of Java SE based desktop client application used to manage fuel card services.
ERoad provides a solution for remote GPS tracking for trucks and fleet management.
I contributed to a feature of “Imported vehicle trip permit handling” of the system including integration with a 3rd party system and front end. Mainly used Spring and jQuery.
Mako Networks is a network management company specializing in network security.

I Involved in developing Mako’s Network Failover Management, Dynamic Router Configurations, Visualized Network Status modules. Contributed to frontend development using jQuery. Optimized router configuration download service latency by optimizing hibernate that added great value to the product.
Worked on a hotel property management and booking system developed by John Keells Computer Services
Involved in full SDLC and contributed for frontend (jQuery) and backend (Java/Spring) development and integration. Introduced JBoss Drools to customize business rules in the booking engine module.
Involved with UAT testing and customer training.
Kandula is a startup initiative that helps users to easily configure, schedule and run JMeter based performance tests in their own cloud environments.
I designed and build the complete system using ReactJS and Serverless Micro services
Kandula won the people's choice award at New Zealand Software Association's Angel at my table event in 2019
